title: *Luxurious 1-Bedroom Apartment w/Skyline Views* 329 1401
posting_body: ["*I Can Show You ALL the Available Units in This Building And ALL of Rentopia's Properties ||", 'NO BROKER FEE*', 'We have a great relationship with this landlord and we are the best point of contact for this building', 'BRAND NEW CONSTRUCTION', '*Luxurious 1-Bedroom Apartment with Skyline Views*', 'The pictures are for illustration purposes only - the unit is similar to the pictures in the listing', '*The Building Features:*', 'State-of-the-art Fitness Facility: Upscale Gym, Yoga Studio, Pool Lounge, Cold Plunge, Sauna, and Steam Room / Rooftop Terrace / Outdoor Terrace with Grills on the 6th Floor / Indoor Lounge / Laundry Facility / On-site Parking Garage / Bike Storage / Storage / High Speed Internet in All the Units / Elevators /', '*The Apartment Features:*', '1 Queen-Size Bedroom / Bathroom with Modern Fixtures, Stone and Tile Finishes, and a Deep Soaking Tub / Floor-to-Ceiling Windows with Amazing Skyline Views / Lots of Natural Light', "Throughout / Great Living Space for Entertaining / Ample Closet Space / Central Air Conditioning / Kitchen with Brand New Modern Appliances including a Dishwasher / Wide Chef's Kitchen Island / Lots of Cabinet and Counter Space / High Ceilings / Oak Plank Flooring / Video Intercom /", "Enjoy the Best Things that Williamsburg has to offer: Domino Park, North 5th Street Pier and Park, McCarren Park, Williamsburg Bridge, Peter Luger Steak House, The West Brooklyn, Shalom Japan, St. Anselm, Sunday In Brooklyn, Oslo Coffee Roasters, Pies 'n' Thighs, Zona Rosa, Fette Sau", 'The Rosemont, Testo', 'Located a Step Away from the J/MZ Trains at Marcy Ave Station', 'A Short walk to the G Train at Broadway Station and the L Train at Metropolitan Ave Station', '*Good credit history 700+ and a combined annual income of $180,000+ (40x times the rent) are required / Personal guarantors are welcome!', '"Insurent" is accepted on a case by case basis*']
